entry.title: Lizard Premium BJJ/MMA Shorts
entry.summary:
Vendor: XMARTIAL
Type: Men - BJJ & MMA Shorts
Price: 47.95

Featuring an intricate lizard scale pattern, the Lizard Premium BJJ/MMA Shorts are exactly what every fighter needs. These MMA shorts will keep up with your intense lifestyle, whether it's extreme workouts, cardio sessions, or training on the mat. Invest in a pair of BJJ shorts that give you a full range of motion with maximum comfort.

Why XMARTIAL Shorts:


  • Anti-slip gel panel added technology for extra grip and comfort.
  • Inside drawstring & velcro waistband enclosure for a secure fit
  • Crafted with the finest fabrics to withstand the toughest training conditions. 
  • Moist-wicking technology to keep away sweats.
  • Fully sublimated graphics that won't crack, peel, or fade over time and maintain a great look. 
  • Breathable, stretchy, and quick dry for maximum comfort. 
  • One-Year Warranty, we stand behind our product quality.
  • 100% Money-Back Guarantee, risk-free buy.
  • Optimized for the highest level of athletic performance in BJJ, MMA, catch wrestling, no-gi, and submission grappling
